true Hit (AC): 1[W] + Intelligence modifier damage.
true 1 Level 21: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier damage.
Hit (Fortitude): If the target willingly moves away from you before the end of its next turn, it takes thunder damage equal to 3 + your Constitution modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus.
